name: performance_training
description: Prepare for live performances and recording sessions with structured practice regimens
command: mirador chain guitar_expert task_planner "Create a 30-day practice regimen to prepare for [PERFORMANCE TYPE]"
notes: This chain specializes in performance preparation for guitarists. The guitar_expert provides technical expertise and practice methodologies while the task_planner organizes them into a progressive schedule with specific goals and milestones.
